title: Potti Sriramulu College of Engineering and Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Potti Sriramulu College of Engineering and Technology Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Potti Sriramulu College of Engineering and Technology Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Potti Sriramulu College of Engineering and Technology Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

PSCMRCET encourages every student to use the library and get knowledge and information. A spacious and well stocked central library with number of volumes, International & National journals of repute caters to the needs of the students of all branches.

Sports: In PSCMRCET Institute, sports are included in the academic curriculum to encourage students in various co-curricular activities. The Institute has annual sports meet every year and students also participate actively in various other tournaments outside the college. Institute has 2 Volley Ball Courts, 2 Badminton Courts, 4 table Tennis Tables and 1 Cricket Net.

Section.name: About PSCMRCET
Section.description:
PSCMR College of Engineering & Technology is SKPVV Hindu High Schools Committee’s latest contribution to the cause of education. The institute was established in the year of 2008.
